publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Zechariah 13
ab.l: Ol ḱuńd́a bolur čoɣaraḥ ačylɣan juv́uńa David́niń da olturuvčularyna Jerušalajimniń juvunma jazyḥtan da jerińčilikt́ań.
Da bolur ol ḱuńd́a alej ajtty H T́eńrisi č́evaʾotnun ėksitirmiń šemĺariń ol abaḥlarnyn ol jerd́ań da saɣynylmaslar artyḥ daɣy ol navi- ĺarni da ol murdar saɣyšny ašyryrmyn ol jerd́ań.

Da bolɣejdyr ki navi- lik ėt́śa hanuz jalɣanlyḥny da ajtyrlar anar atasy da anasy t́oŕav́č́u- ĺari tiri bolmassyn ki jalɣanny śoźĺadij šemińd́ań H-nyn da čančarlar any atasy da anasy t́oŕav́č́uĺari navilik ėt́ḱanińd́a alarɣa.

Da bolur
ol ḱuńd́a ujatly bolurlar ol naviĺar kiši ḱoŕuḿuńd́ań navi- ligińd́ań da kijḿaśĺar t́ukĺu upraḥ aldamaḥ üč́uń.
Da ajtyr t́uv́uĺ navi ḿeń jer iš́ĺav́č́u kiši ḿeń adam ḿeń qojdu ḿeni tuvar ḱut́uv́č́u jaš- lyḥlarymdan.
Da ajtyr anar ńedir ol vatmaḥlar ušpular arasyna qollaryjnyn da ajtyr ki vatyldym juv́uńd́a śuv́arĺarimniń.
Qylyč ojanɣyn ḱut́uv́č́um üśt́uńa da juvuḥ kišim üśt́uńa alej ajtty H T́eńrisi č́evaʾotnun vatḥyn ol ḱut́uv́č́uńu da t ozulurlar ol qoj da qajttyryrmyn ḥyššy- mymny ol tar b́eŕuv́č́uĺar üśt́uńa.
Da bolur bar ol jerd́a alej ajtty H üĺuš́ĺar anda ėksilirĺar tynarlar da ol üč́uńč́u üĺuš́ qalyr anda.

Da keĺtirirmiń ol üč́uńč́u üĺuš́ńu otḥa da syzɣyryrmyn alarny syzɣyrmaɣyn kibik ol ḱuḿuš́ńuń da synarmyn any synamaɣyn kibik ol altynnyn ol čaɣyryr šemim byla da ḿeń qaruv b́erirmiń anar ajtyrmyn ulusum ol da ol ajtyr יוָ֘י T́eńrim.

app.note: F305-90: spelled tuzulurlar; a scribal error.
